attributes.action: concentrate on things such as our financial crisis and leave old Russ and Wossy to do their jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Russell Brand and Jonathon Ross have been suspended due to this whole thing being blown right our of proportion by people who I have no doubt have even listened or ever plant to listen to these great entertainers shows.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
